metadata.Title: CVE-2019-3900 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
An infinite loop issue was found in the vhost_net kernel module in LinuxKernel up to and including v5.1-rc6, while handling incoming packets inhandle_rx(). It could occur if one end sends packets faster than the otherend can process them. A guest user, maybe remote one, could use this flawto stall the vhost_net kernel thread, resulting in a DoS scenario.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-3900` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-161.189
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-161.189

Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
